apiChineseName: 淘宝客-推广者-万能转链

applyScopes.name: 淘宝客【推广者】万能转链

description: 淘宝客-推广者-万能转链

labels.tips: 不需要用户授权，就能获取到数据

name: taobao.tbk.dg.general.link.convert

publicParams.description: 用户登录授权成功后，TOP颁发给应用的授权信息，详细介绍请点击这里。当此API的标签上注明：“需要授权”，则此参数必传；“不需要授权”，则此参数不需要传；“可选授权”，则此参数为可选
publicParams.name: session

publicParams.description: 时间戳，格式为yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss，时区为GMT+8，例如：2015-01-01 12:00:00。淘宝API服务端允许客户端请求最大时间误差为10分钟
publicParams.name: timestamp

publicParams.description: 签名的摘要算法，可选值为：hmac，md5，hmac-sha256。
publicParams.name: sign_method

publicParams.description: API输入参数签名结果，签名算法介绍请点击这里
publicParams.name: sign

publicParams.description: 响应格式。默认为xml格式，可选值：xml，json。
publicParams.name: format

publicParams.description: 是否采用精简JSON返回格式，仅当format=json时有效，默认值为：false
publicParams.name: simplify

publicResponseParams.description: 平台颁发的每次请求访问的唯一标识
publicResponseParams.name: request_id

publicResponseParams.description: 请求访问失败时返回的根节点
publicResponseParams.name: error_response

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误码
publicResponseParams.name: code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误码
publicResponseParams.name: sub_code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: sub_msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求成功返回的根节点，'***' 为API名称的下划线模式
publicResponseParams.name: ***_response

requestParams.description: 1-动态ID转链场景，2-消费者比价场景，4-
requestParams.name: biz_scene_id

requestParams.description: 1-自购省，2-推广赚（代理模式专属ID，代理模式必填，其它模式不用填写本字段）
requestParams.name: promotion_type

requestParams.description: 物料列表，可以为url或淘口令,多个时使用英文逗号拼接传入
requestParams.name: material_list

requestParams.description: 渠道管理ID（如是主站选品推广场景，必须入参该字段，且bizSceneId字段需入参2-消费者比价场景，否则二次转链失败）
requestParams.name: relation_id

requestParams.description: 推广位id，mm_xx_xx_xx pid三段式中的第三段
requestParams.name: adzone_id

requestParams.description: 卖家ID列表,多个时使用英文逗号拼接传入
requestParams.name: seller_id_list

requestParams.description: 商品ID列表,多个时使用英文逗号拼接传入
requestParams.name: item_id_list

requestParams.description: 会场ID列表,多个时使用英文逗号拼接传入
requestParams.name: page_id_list

subParams.description: 页面内定坑商品ID，用于素材-坑位还原
subParams.name: item_id_list

subParams.description: 入参商品id下的skuid，传入时会透传至转链结果url中
subParams.name: sku_id

subParams.description: 是否指定券，1-指定 0-不指定 默认为0（邀约制权限，仅面向KA淘宝客）
subParams.name: is_target_coupon

subParams.description: 优惠券id（邀约制权限，仅面向KA淘宝客）
subParams.name: coupon_id

subParams.description: 淘宝客外部用户标记，如自身系统账户ID；微信ID等
subParams.name: external_id

subParams.description: 1表示商品转通用计划链接，其他值或不传表示转最优佣金率（含营销计划）链接
subParams.name: dx

subParams.description: 页面内定坑商品ID，用于素材-坑位还原
subParams.name: target_item_list

subParams.description: 物料链接，可以为url或淘口令
subParams.name: material_url

subParams.description: 是否指定券，1-指定 0-不指定 默认为0（邀约制权限，仅面向KA淘宝客）
subParams.name: is_target_coupon

subParams.description: 优惠券id（邀约制权限，仅面向KA淘宝客）
subParams.name: coupon_id

subParams.description: 商品收入比率(%)：商品佣金比率+补贴比率。同物料类接口income_rate
subParams.name: commission_rate

subParams.description: 佣金类型。MKT表示营销计划，SP表示定向计划，COMMON表示通用计划，ZX表示自选计划
subParams.name: commission_type

subParams.description: 1—单品 2—店铺 3—会场 4-承接开放 5-优惠券 6-直播间 7-淘积木页
subParams.name: material_type

subParams.description: 淘口令原始链接，入参物料不为淘口令时，此字段返回null
subParams.name: tpwd_origin_url

subParams.description: 物料ID，需根据material_type判断物料类型， 可能为商品ID、卖家ID、会场ID
subParams.name: material_id

subParams.description: 1-联盟口令，2-主站口令。入参物料不为淘口令时，此字段返回null
subParams.name: tk_biz_type

subParams.description: 转链成功的场景下，需要补充说明的信息
subParams.name: extra_info

subParams.description: 优惠券信息，满XX元减XX元，满x件减y元
subParams.name: coupon_desc

sdkDemos.descprition:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import top.api

req=top.api.TbkDgGeneralLinkConvertRequest(url,port)
req.set_app_info(top.appinfo(appkey,secret))

req.biz_scene_id="1"
req.promotion_type="2"
req.material_list="https://s.click.taobao.com/pQBDhNu,https://s.click.taobao.com/pQBDhNu"
req.relation_id="123456"
req.adzone_id=123456
req.seller_id_list="123456"
req.item_id_list="qYtxrMJOC8tmtM-Qq0Z65Sbbq5DqZ9"
req.page_id_list="123456"
req.target_item="数据结构示例JSON格式"
req.item_dto="item_dto"
req.page_dto="page_dto"
req.shop_dto="shop_dto"
req.material_dto="material_dto"
req.special_id="123"
req.uvid="adjso7389rbnasd"
req.qmtid="123"
try:
	resp= req.getResponse()
	print(resp)
except Exception,e:
	print(e)

NodeJS
C/C++

sdkDemos.descprition:
from datetime import datetime
from topsdk.client import TopApiClient,TopException
from topsdk.defaultability.defaultability import Defaultability
from topsdk.defaultability.request.taobao_tbk_dg_general_link_convert_request import *

if __name__ == '__main__':
    # create Client
    client = TopApiClient(appkey='<your-appkey>', app_sercet='<your-appsecret>', top_gateway_url='<top-gateway-url>',verify_ssl=False)
    ability = Defaultability(client=client)

    # create domain
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertTargetItemDTO = TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertTargetItemDTO()
    """
        xxx
    """
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertTargetItemDTO.item_id_list = []
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO = TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO()
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.item_id = 'i87a9ja90d8-09qrjcoa7qwl'
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.sku_id = 123
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.is_target_coupon = 1
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.coupon_id = '9urytzd6k4'
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.external_id = '123'
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.dx = '1'
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO.manage_pub_id = 123456
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkPageDTO = TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkPageDTO()
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkPageDTO.page_id = '20356789765'
    """
        xxx
    """
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkPageDTO.target_item_list = []
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkShopDTO = TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkShopDTO()
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkShopDTO.shop_id = '123456'
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO = TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO()
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO.material_url = 's.click.taobao.com'
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO.is_target_coupon = 1
    taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO.coupon_id = '9urytzd6k4'

    # create request
    request = TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertRequest()
    request.biz_scene_id = '1'
    request.promotion_type = '2'
    """
        https://s.click.taobao.com/pQBDhNu,https://s.click.taobao.com/pQBDhNu
    """
    request.material_list = []
    request.relation_id = '123456'
    request.adzone_id = 123456
    """
        123456
    """
    request.seller_id_list = []
    """
        qYtxrMJOC8tmtM-Qq0Z65Sbbq5DqZ9
    """
    request.item_id_list = []
    """
        123456
    """
    request.page_id_list = []
    request.target_item = taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertTargetItemDTO
    """
        item_dto
    """
    request.item_dto = []
    """
        page_dto
    """
    request.page_dto = []
    """
        shop_dto
    """
    request.shop_dto = []
    """
        material_dto
    """
    request.material_dto = []
    request.special_id = '123'
    request.uvid = 'adjso7389rbnasd'
    request.qmtid = '123'
    try:
        response = ability.taobao_tbk_dg_general_link_convert(request)
        print(response)
    except TopException as e:
        print(e)

<?php
require "../vendor/autoload.php";
use Topsdk\Topapi\TopApiClient;

// create Client
$client = new TopApiClient("<your-appkey>","<your-appsecret>","<top-gateway-url>");
$ability = new Defaultability($client);

// create domain

$taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkItemDTO->setManagePubId(123456);
$taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkPageDTO = new TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkPageDTO();

$taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO->setIsTargetCoupon(1);
$taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertLkMaterialDTO->setCouponId("9urytzd6k4");

// create request
$request = new TaobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvertRequest();
$request->setBizSceneId("1");
$request->setPromotionType("2");
/*
    https://s.click.taobao.com/pQBDhNu,https://s.click.taobao.com/pQBDhNu
*/

*/

*/

*/

*/

*/

*/

$request->setSpecialId("123");

$request->setQmtid("123");

$response = $ability->taobaoTbkDgGeneralLinkConvert($request);
